translations.open-source-page.description: IDEM is fully open source under Apache 2.0 license. Your data stays in Africa with complete transparency, no vendor lock-in, and community-driven development.

translations.open-source-page.dataSovereignty.title: Your Data Stays in Africa
translations.open-source-page.dataSovereignty.descrip: IDEM deploys on African cloud infrastructure, ensuring your data remains on the continent.

translations.open-source-page.start_building_with: Start Building with Open Source AI
translations.open-source-page.cta.description: Experience the freedom of open source with the power of AI. Start for free today.
translations.open-source-page.features.sourceCode.des: Complete transparency with access to all source code under Apache 2.0 license.

translations.open-source-page.features.noLockIn.descr: Freedom to self-host, modify, and migrate without restrictions.

translations.open-source-page.seo.title: Open Source & Data Sovereignty | IDEM - African AI Platform
translations.open-source-page.seo.description: IDEM is 100% open source under Apache 2.0 license with full data sovereignty. Your data stays in Africa with complete transparency, no vendor lock-in, and community-driven development.
translations.open-source-page.seo.keywords: open source AI, Apache 2.0 license, data sovereignty, African cloud, no vendor lock-in, self-hosted AI, transparent AI, community driven, open source platform, data privacy Africa, sovereign technology, African tech independence
